import React from 'react' const Carousel = () => { setInterval(() => { var random_im_id = Math.floor(Math.random() * (3) + 1) console.log(random_im_id) document.getElementById('intro').style.backgroundImage = 'url(./img/carousel-top/carousel-' + random_im_id + '.jpg)' }, 3000); return (

) } export default Carousel
